page.title: 04SHOPPING IN S.E.LUTON(3)
page.content: Class 4 at{Wenlock Junior School carried out a survey of their local shops.They found that prices were higher than in the town centre supermarkets.Local shops were used for small items and when people had run out of things. {LAUNDRETTE.}Few people used it because most families have their own washing machine or wash clothes by hand. {HAIRDRESSERS.}Most used other shops. {GREENGROCERS.}Handy for local people, open 8.30-5.30 with a 90 min. break. Busy Saturdays,owner lives above shop. {CO-OP.}Owned by The South Midlands Cooperative SG Ltd.Sells groceries, meat,frozen foods,sweets and drinks. {OFF LICENCE.}Open Tu-Sat 10-30 to 1-30 and 5-00 to 10-00.Sun 12-2 and 7-9. Owners live above the premises. {NEWSAGENTS.}Open 7-00 to 6-00.Employs 4 people plus newspaper delivery boys.
